lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court has allowed Texas to use its strict voter ID law in the November election even after a federal judge said the law was the equivalent of a poll tax and threatened to deprive many blacks and Latinos of the right to vote this year.

headline.main: High Court Balks at Last-Minute Voting Changes
headline.print_headline: High Court Balks at Last-Minute Voting Changes

snippet: The Supreme Court has allowed Texas to use its strict voter ID law in the November election even after a federal judge said the law was the equivalent of a poll tax and threatened to deprive many blacks and Latinos of the right to vote this year....
